headline.main: Radioman Wiley, His Pilot Killed in Battle With Zeros, Drifted, Wounded, for Two Weeks -- Rescued With Fortress Crew

lead_paragraph: A SOUTH PACIFIC BASE, April 30 -- This is the story of Delmar D. Wiley's 218 days as a castaway, a saga of lonely survival on the open sea and on the beaches of islets fringing the enemy-held Northern Solomons.
abstract: Rescue after 218 days as castaway described
snippet: A SOUTH PACIFIC BASE, April 30 -- This is the story of Delmar D. Wiley's 218 days as a castaway, a saga of lonely survival on the open sea and on the beaches of islets fringing the enemy-held Northern Solomons....
